statements: SELECT * FROM in_game_store;
SELECT purchase_id, player_id, item_name FROM in_game_store WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM in_game_store WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM in_game_store WHERE item_price > 10.00 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM in_game_store GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM in_game_store WHERE item_price > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_price, currency FROM in_game_store WHERE currency = 'USD' ORDER BY item_price ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS itemCount, SUM(item_price) AS totalCost FROM in_game_store WHERE player_id = 'abcdefg';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(player_id) AS purchaseCount FROM in_game_store GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(player_id) > 3;
SELECT player_id, AVG(item_price) AS avgPrice FROM in_game_store WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY avgPrice DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT player_id, item_id, item_name FROM purchases WHERE item_price > 50 ORDER BY item_price ASC
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM purchases WHERE item_id = 3
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, item_name FROM purchases WHERE player_id = 100
SELECT AVG(item_price) AS average_price FROM purchases
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE player_id = 101 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_price, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE item_id = 105 AND item_price > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(item_price) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT player_id, items_owned FROM inventory WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(items_owned) > 5 ORDER BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, currency_amount FROM inventory WHERE currency_amount < 5000 ORDER BY currency_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases;
SELECT player_id, SUM(price) AS total_spent FROM in_game_purchases GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT purchase_id, item_name, price FROM in_game_purchases WHERE price > 100;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM in_game_purchases GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(item_quantity) AS total_items FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_items > 50;
SELECT item_name, price FROM in_game_purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY price DESC, item_name;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_items DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM virtual_currencies WHERE exchange_rate < 1.0 ORDER BY currency_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT purchase_id, player_id, item_id, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, purchase_date FROM players JOIN purchases ON players.player_id = purchases.player_id WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5;
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_items FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_items > 10;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_id ASC;
SELECT player_name, item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY player_name ASC;

SELECT purchases.purchase_id, players.player_name, currencies.currency_name FROM purchases JOIN players ON purchases.player_id = players.player_id JOIN currencies ON players.currency_id = currencies.currency_id;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT player_name, currency_name, exchange_rate FROM players JOIN currencies ON players.currency_id = currencies.currency_id ORDER BY exchange_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Purchase;
SELECT player_id, item_id, amount FROM Purchase;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM Item ORDER BY item_name;
SELECT player_name, email FROM PlayerProfile WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM PlayerInventory GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM Purchase WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Purchase GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM Item WHERE item_price > 100 ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT player_name, email FROM PlayerProfile WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM PlayerInventory JOIN Item ON PlayerInventory.item_id = Item.item_id WHERE quantity > 10;
